projects.title: Baseball Stats App
projects.description: React & Redux web app for tracking your favorite MLB team's game details, standings, player stats, and recent news.

projects.title: Essentials Habit Tracker
projects.description: Django web app for developing healthy, positive habits by tracking daily streaks for three personalized 'essentials'.

projects.title: IdealSeat Website
projects.description: A clean and simple marketing website design built using the static site generator Gatsby, connected to a git-based CMS.
